sect1.title: General
sect1.para: Chorus needs to broadcast ORU Data HW-part no (11 bytes)- HW version no. (3 bytes)- SW version no. (4 bytes)- IVD-P Value (32 bytes) in a multiplexed E2E protected PDU "ORU_0019" to SAM (ORU_SafeGuard2). ORU Data is responsible to broadcast the multiplexed message. It does have an init function, however it does not have a cyclic task. Instead a PrepareHook function shall be called as a generated RTE function call from SAFE_Update_Msg_ORU_0019 in order to update the provided multiplexed message.
